sentences.en: A district mayor performed the ceremony and said the bride looked ravishing.
sentences.cn: 一位区长主持了他们的婚礼,并称赞新娘非常迷人.

sentences.en: After experienced the supernatural, fun and ravishing journey, Pinoccio became more honest and likable.
sentences.cn: 经历一番神奇 、 滑稽、引人入胜的奇遇.匹诺曹变了, 懂事了,诚实了.

sentences.en: Darling, you look simply ravishing in that dress!
sentences.cn: 亲爱的, 你穿上那件连衣裙真漂亮!

sentences.en: Manya and Hela wanted to be especially ravishing that night.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上玛尼娅和海拉想打扮得特别漂亮.

sentences.en: The film is ravishing to look at and boasts a sensuous musical score.
sentences.cn: 这部电影画面迷人，配乐悦耳动听。

sentences.en: You certainly look ravishing tonight, darling.
sentences.cn: 亲爱的,你今晚真的迷人极了.

words.tran_cn: 迷人地；令人神魂颠倒地

trans.tran_en: If you describe someone or something as ravishing, you mean that they are very beautiful

trans.tran_cn: 使欣喜若狂，使着迷，使心醉( ravish的现在分词 )
